CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Alliance to run this profile!
We are not accepting bug reports against the 90-100 portion of this pack. Please do NOT open new threads in the forum regarding bugs with these profiles--such threads will be deleted!
Profile is written to assume sparring ring is chosen. YOU MUST CHOOSE THE SPARRING RING OR THE PROFILE WILL NOT RUN PROPERLY.

CustomBehavior.Lua: if MovieFrame:IsVisible() then MovieFrame:StopMovie() else CinematicFrame_CancelCinematic() end
for i=1,40 do local id=select(11,UnitAura('player',i)) if id == 168474 then CancelUnitBuff('player',i) break end end
